Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class CollectableLives

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.GameObject
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Item
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.CollectableLives
public class CollectableLives extends Item
Represents a heart item on the ground that gives the player extra lives. When collected, it increases the player's life count and disappears.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • CollectableLives

      public CollectableLives(float x, float y, float size, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion textureRegion, int lifeAmount)
      Creates a new heart item at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate in the game world
      y - y coordinate in the game world
      size - width and height of the heart sprite
      textureRegion - the image to display for this heart
      lifeAmount - how many lives to give when collected (usually 1)

  • Method Details

    • onCollected

      public void onCollected(Player player)
      Handles what happens when the player touches this heart. Increases player lives, plays a sound, and removes the heart from the map.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who collected this item

    • draw

      public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch)
      Draws the heart on screen if it's still active.
      Overrides:
      draw in class GameObject
      Parameters:
      batch - the LibGDX batch used for rendering
